sentences.en: Boats had plenty of mackerel and a few skate.
sentences.cn: 那些船上有许多鲭鱼，还有几条鳐鱼。

sentences.en: Don't skateboard or roller skate on the road..
sentences.cn: 不要在路上玩滑板或溜冰.

sentences.en: He always tries to skate over difficulties.
sentences.cn: 他总是试图把困难一语带过.

sentences.en: He is learning how to skate.
He taught her how to skate.
I m learning to skate on real ice!
In less than an hour Andy's skate had turned to an icy yacht.
sentences.cn: 不出一小时,安迪的微醺变成了酩酊大醉.

sentences.en: Interest in the skate board tailed off.
sentences.cn: 人们对滑冰板的兴趣渐渐小了.

sentences.en: It took him only three days to learn to skate.
sentences.cn: 他三天功夫就学会了滑冰.

sentences.en: Scientists have tended to skate over the difficulties of explaining dreams.
sentences.cn: 科学家们往往回避释梦的难题。

sentences.en: The children skated on the frozen pond.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在结冰的池塘上滑冰。

sentences.en: The ice is hard enough to skate on.
sentences.cn: 冰层已够坚厚,可以滑冰.

sentences.en: The ice is not strong enough to skate upon.
sentences.cn: 冰太薄不可在上面滑冰.

sentences.en: They prefer to skate around the issue of sex discrimination.
sentences.cn: 他们不愿多触及性别歧视的问题.

sentences.en: They were picked to skate against the visiting team.
sentences.cn: 他们被选出来与客队比赛溜冰.

sentences.en: When I skate, I'm fearful of the sparkling ice.
sentences.cn: 我滑冰的时候很怕那闪亮的冰.

words.tran_cn: 滑溜冰板的人；滑板运动员

phrases.tran_cn: 四轮滑冰鞋；轮式溜冰鞋

trans.tran_en: one of a pair of boots with metal blades on the bottom, for moving quickly on ice
